content.raw: The patch looks good to me but I think that we don't have any jenkins jobs for ign-core, do we? It would work better to include this commit with the rest of support for ign-core in release-tools (DSL for creation of jenkins job + scripts for building).
content.html: The patch looks good to me but I think that we don't have any jenkins jobs for ign-core, do we? It would work better to include this commit with the rest of support for ign-core in release-tools (DSL for creation of jenkins job + scripts for building).
